page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LEE
page.content:
The usual school day for me is getting up at 7.15am.I then get dressed into my school uniform,which is a grey jumper,white shirt and black trousers. When I go downstairs I get my breakfast,which is toast and jam. After breakfast I go and have a wash, then I pack my bag and leave for school at 8.25am.
My school is{Connaught Middle School,} in Bagshot.I walk to school,and get there at 8.40am.The bell goes at 8.55am.My teacher is Mrs Lynch. Normally my first lesson is Maths,then French,then follow up after lunch. School ends at 3.15pm.When I get home I do my homework then I watch the television until I go to bed at 10pm.
